name: tiny-translator
description: A tiny web application to translate xliff files

scripts.extract-i18n: ng xi18n tiny-translator --output-path src/i18n --locale en && xliffmerge --profile xliffmerge.json en de fr-google ru-google
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-prod-en && npm run build-prod-de && npm run build-prod-fr && npm run build-prod-ru && cpx ./src/ghpages/* ./dist
scripts.build-prod-en: cross-env-shell LANG="en" XLFFILE="src/i18n/messages.en.xlf" npm run build-prod-lang
scripts.build-prod-de: cross-env-shell LANG="de" XLFFILE="src/i18n/messages.de.xlf" npm run build-prod-lang
scripts.build-prod-fr: cross-env-shell LANG="fr" XLFFILE="src/i18n/messages.fr-google.xlf" npm run build-prod-lang
scripts.build-prod-ru: cross-env-shell LANG="ru" XLFFILE="src/i18n/messages.ru-google.xlf" npm run build-prod-lang
scripts.ngsw-copy-lang: cross-env-shell cpx node_modules/@angular/service-worker/ngsw-worker.js dist/$LANG/ && cross-env-shell replace /ngsw.json /tiny-translator/$LANG/ngsw.json dist/$LANG/ngsw-worker.js
scripts.build-prod-lang: cross-env-shell ng build --prod --aot --i18n-file=$XLFFILE --locale=$LANG --i18n-format=xlf --base-href=/tiny-translator/$LANG/ --output-path=dist/$LANG && cross-env-shell npm run ngsw-config-lang && cross-env-shell npm run ngsw-copy-lang
scripts.echox: cross-env-shell X="aValue" Y="anotherValue" npm run echo
scripts.echo: cross-env-shell echo lmaa $X $Y && cross-env-shell echo lmaa2 $Y $X
